/usr/bin/gcc  -fPIC  -msse -W -Wall  -O2 -g   -shared -Wl,-soname,liballegro_primitives.so.5.0 -o ../../lib/liballegro_primitives.so.5.0.10 CMakeFiles/allegro_primitives.dir/high_primitives.c.o CMakeFiles/allegro_primitives.dir/line_soft.c.o CMakeFiles/allegro_primitives.dir/prim_directx.c.o CMakeFiles/allegro_primitives.dir/prim_opengl.c.o CMakeFiles/allegro_primitives.dir/prim_soft.c.o CMakeFiles/allegro_primitives.dir/point_soft.c.o CMakeFiles/allegro_primitives.dir/primitives.c.o CMakeFiles/allegro_primitives.dir/directx_shaders.c.o ../../lib/liballegro.so.5.0.10 -lm -lpthread -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lXcursor -lXinerama -lXrandr -lGL -lGLU -Wl,-rpath,/home/anhong/Downloads/allegro/b/lib:
